reviewText: Ordered this DVD as a Christmas gift for my great grandfather and it won't work in ANY DVD player that I have tried it in. Luckily I ordered two different ones, so he had something to watch and enjoy, but I was pretty disappointed that I wasn't able to get it to play. On a positive note, it got to my house really quickly and I was able to get it wrapped and put under the tree for Christmas in time...Better luck next time I guess, right?
I bought two Lawrence Welk videos to give to the nursing home.  They were well received and my Mother enjoys them.

The C.D. was ordered for my older sister who has short term memory loss and resides at an assisted living facility. She has enjoyed it very much. She loves music and has always enjoyed the Lawrence Welk Show. I recommend this C.D. very highly .

I LOVE "The Lawrence Welk Show", especially the black and white years.  The three shows in this collection were from 1960, 1962, and 1963.  They were live shows, taken from kinescopes, but the quality is pretty good!  My only complaint is that the commercials have been edited out, and the cuts are a bit abrupt, and thee were a few jumps in the picture.  The shows on this DVD are WAY better than the newer color shows that are shown ad nauseum on PBS.

The Lennon Sisters, Barbara and Bobby, Bob Lido, Aladdin, Dick Dale, Rocky Rockwell, Jerry Burke, Frank Scott, Larry Hooper, Joann Castle, Jack Imel, and the rest of Lawrence's fine orchestra and cast are on this collection.

If you're a Lawrence Welk fan, or just like good wholesome TV and music, order this DVD!
This DVD brings the best of Lawrence Welk back to family that were his fans.  The shows were always well done and enjoyable and it is nice to see them again.
This is true talent. Folks used to be so truly talented and Lawrence Welk certainly made the best use of very accomplished folk who crossed his path!
GOT THIS FOR MY MOTHER AND FOR THE NURSING CARE CENTER SHE WAS LIVING IN. THEY ALL LOVED IT --LOTS OF MEMORIES
My Mother so enjoy's watching Lawrence Welk every Saturday just as she used to do years before. These bring back such wonderful memories for her. The music and d ancing is very entertaining.

This was such a fun video. Growing up in the 50's and early 60's it was so fun to see all the old Lawrence Welk stars I remember from my childhood. The Lennon sisters were especially fun to see again. The Father's Day special really brings back some precious memories!

Bought this for my dad as he is a long time Lawerence Welk fan. I bought several others  also. He does prefer the color versions best. Highly recomend all the dvd's as they bring back great memories when it was on tv.
I ordered this video for my 31 year old daughter who is mentally disabled and wheelchair bound. Her main activity is watching her videos and she loves this one. It arrived on time and is a great buy.

I was not at all happy with the DVD as I was not expecting it to be black and white, the shading was so bad that my father, whom I had purchased the video for, was unable to watch it. Is is possible to return it?
This movie is really hard to watch because the quality of picture is black and white and not exactly a crystal clear picture. The sound is also not the best quality. I would not recommend this video.
I purchased this DVD for an Alzheimer center.  The clients there loved it and have watched it over and over.  It is fun to watch their faces as they relive happier times.
everyone loves at the nursing home
Picture quality is poor but sound is fine.
They were original shoes and in black and white. The music was good.
Satisfied customer!
Older parent loves the music and the talent.  The shows are classic Lawrence Welk, bringing smiles to all who watch it.
nice music and enjoyed seeing the original performers
Served the purpose

Lawrence Welk make many memories for those in our parent's generation.  It will probably stir up some warm feelings for all who can remember Model T's, Model A's and rear car doors that open with the hinge on the back side!
Good sound great music bought this for my client who enjoys lawrence welk every night I put it on before bed he enjoys these dvds
I purchased this as a gift to my mother-in-law, a dyed in the wool Welk fan!  She said that she loved it.
